name: Connor Langan: Processing, Orbits, Revenge Racing, The bunny gets the Pancakes!
name_original: Connor Langan: Processing, Orbits, Revenge Racing, The bunny gets the Pancakes!
description:
Prototype 1: A processing game based on the 'Four Seasons'

Prototype 2: A Unity game Based on how space craft use orbits to propel themselves forward

Prototype 3: A two player racing game where both players control both vehicles.

Prototype 4: A Leap Motion game about sorting food
